name: Women in Diaspora
description: Because of gendered responsibilities for creating homes, migrant women create and experience diasporic relations (to family and friends elsewhere) in distinctive ways. This course uses methods and materials from literature, history and the social sciences to understand the meaning of home for migrant women from many different cultural origins.
prerequisites: 1.0 credit at the A-level in AFS, CLA, GAS, HIS or WST courses
